name: Microgame Jam 2022 - Arts and Crafts
description:
Assembled from GDA's Microgame Jam 2022: https://itch.io/jam/microgame-jam-2022. We got together for 36 hours and made a bunch of microgames based around the theme: Arts and Crafts. Now we've compiled them all together into one big super-game! This version of the build also includes some games from a dry run of the jam we did a few months ago.

The Game Design & Art Collaboration (GDA) is a student-run club based out of UC Santa Cruz. To learn more and see our other games, visit gdacollab.com.

Controls

Arrow Keys and Spacebar. The Microgames' controls are context-sensitive, so you'll have to figure out what the controls do in the moment. You can also use arrow keys + spacebar to navigate in the menus. 

We also support controllers, with the default mapping being Left Analog Stick and the bottom face button ("A" for Xbox, and "X" for Playstation).

You can also remap keybindings/controller inputs in the options section.
